emails.subject: Comprehensive Proposal for New HR System
emails.body:
Hello,

We are exploring options for a new HR management system that integrates recruitment, onboarding, performance tracking, and benefits administration. Our current platform is outdated and lacks mobile support. We require a solution with robust reporting and analytics, customizable workflows, and seamless integration with our payroll provider. Please review our requirements document and provide a detailed proposal including timeline and cost estimates.

emails.subject: Re: Comprehensive Proposal for New HR System
emails.body:
Dear HR Manager,

Thank you for outlining your needs. We believe our HR360 platform fits your criteria. It offers end-to-end functionality, mobile access, and advanced analytics. I've attached an overview and cost estimate. Let me know if you need further details or a live demo.

emails.subject: Re: Comprehensive Proposal for New HR System
emails.body: Thank you for the quick response. Could you clarify whether your platform supports multi-country payroll tax calculations and if custom reporting dashboards can be built by our internal team?

emails.subject: Re: Comprehensive Proposal for New HR System
emails.body: Yes, HR360 supports multi-country payroll tax rules out of the box. Users can create and tweak reports via our dashboard builder. Additionally, we offer training sessions for your team to build custom dashboards.

emails.subject: Re: Comprehensive Proposal for New HR System
emails.body: That sounds promising. Please send over the formal contract and proposed implementation schedule. We'll review internally and circle back early next week.
